Name: 武道戰姬 - 女僕(武道戦姫 - メイド / Budo Girl War - Maid)
About the game: New game will be released soon, welcome to participate in crowdfunding! Q group: 675721669, s team group: Press 'F' in the main interface of the game to open the patch; Maid themed casual pinball adventure game; Hit the magic ball to remove the invisible realm, save hidden in the dark world junior, with her to sign a contract! Features: 1. Beautiful maid costume little sister, each character has a different maid costume, and some characters have their own actions; 2. Each little sister has different skills, such as su jiu's wooden thorn, wen qi's egg pinching, he qin's shoe throwing, etc. 3. A maximum of 25 hd drawings can be collected for the indenture; 4.Budo Girl War - Maid is a game for Budo Girl Warl. Tip: 1. R18 adult content need through the DLC, details see: 2. Game fighting interface, press 'H' to increase the number of fat times; Do not recommend to use, find game rules, very good can customs clearance; ------------------ in fact, what I really want to say is ---------------- This is our first PC game;（The game is still not enough, is constantly updated.If the game can return to this, we will be out sequel or DLC!） After the failure of the last game and the dissolution of the research and development team, I decided to continue to do, to complete the unfinished dream; In December 2018, I called or informed the developers of the last game, and received nearly all the support. And then I went full time to prepare and launch this thing... , other staff working part-time; In March 2019, due to busy work, we could not start the program. I began to learn the program from this time, this is my first game written with all the code, make a lot of jokes, do while learning while asking; In July 2019, the game was made for 7 months before you knew it... Since there is no money to find English translation, the English version omits thousand words of story description, UI USES machine translation; No Chinese or English dubbing; Three months after the game returns to the original code and art of the game, the original code and art will be freely licensed to those who need it, supporting the development of independent games; Thanks to those who have helped us during this time: R&d personnel: Designer/program/script: June fever Original art: KIKI, Detective Action: mourning dog Music/sound effects: unreal white Japanese dubbing: purple lotus Yin month Scene /UI: durian gas Thanks to minassan for her support and help: Thanks for technical support: admire white sheep Game consultant and overseas marketing consultant: Ben Internal test players: pessimistic salted fish, kite flying too fast in hand, milk tea, arlin, mechanism fishing fish, UP Lord is not gay is orange, mila the world's first, I think, jindao unlove, jingji bell, thick fragrant tea, shenyin magic hige, hua yu, big root, Akashi, association painting, fenryl and other contract players
